news.title: blk. announced as Emerge Belfast Sunday headliner
news.summary: The Saturday lineup is yet to be released.

news.title: RTÉ will not participate in or broadcast Eurovision 2026: "Ireland’s participation remains unconscionable given the appalling loss of lives in Gaza"
news.summary: "RTÉ remains deeply concerned by the targeted killing of journalists in Gaza during the conflict and the continued denial of access to international journalists to the territory," the broadcaster's statement reads.

news.title: Live Report: Florence Road captivate The Academy with a diverse and inspiring set
news.summary: Following a run of support slots, and an Other Voices appearance, Florence Road were more than ready to take on The Academy, in Dublin, on Sunday night.

news.title: Seán O’Meara to release new album NOTIONS, POTIONS & EMOTIONS tomorrow
Christmas Gift Guide 2025: Giving The Gift of the Garb – Irish Fashion, Merch and More
news.summary: Here are some highlights from the 2025 Hot Press Gift Guide...

news.title: Ger Eaton: “For me, the music I’ve created has always been the solace I’ve had, the thing I have to hold onto"
news.summary: Renaissance man and retro-vintage aficionado Ger Eaton chats to Will Russell about his stellar solo debut, Season Changes.

news.title: EBU begins talks over Israel’s Eurovision participation
news.summary: Countries such as Ireland, Iceland, Spain and the Netherlands have threatened to pull out of the 2026 contest if Israel takes part.

news.title: Luz - On Our Radar Q&A: "Posting anonymously helped me find my voice when I was too shy to perform in person"
news.summary: Rising singer-songwriter Luz discusses her excellent new single, ‘The Minute You’re Gone’.
